page.title: 02INDUSTRIES IN BO'NESS
page.content: There are quite a few industries in Bo'ness along the foreshore. There are 3 woodyards, Robinson & Dunn, Walker Timber and the Smith Brothers. The woodyards were originally built in Bo'ness to be near the docks so the wood could be easily transported from other countries. Stephen Dolton Shipbreakers is now closing down. It has been working for 80 years. Shieldness is a potato factory. It makes frozen chips and potatoes but it only caters for restaurants and cafes. There are 2 foundries Ballantine and Bo'ness Iron Company. Robertson the builders who have built many houses in Bo'ness and much of Central Scotland have a factory here. E.J.S. and Cochranes engineering firms have factories in the area.
